polychemprint3.mainMethod module¶

The mainMethod module runs the command line interface for PolyChemPrint and ‘executes’ the program.
First created on Sat Oct 19 21:56:15 2019
Revised: 20/10/2019 00:34:27
Author: Bijal Patel
